column2: A workflow for  top-level project workspace items.
Project itself is visible to all members of a project.
Project itself is visible and editable by owner and managers only.

Project is publicly visible to any and all parties on the Internet, including anonymous visitors.  Visibility of the items contained within the project is determined by those items, and not this state.
Project is restricted to workspace manager(s) (read-only access can additionally be granted in sharing page).
Make project private to owner (usually its creator) and users with Manager or Site Administrator roles.
Make project visible to all its members.
Restrict project to users with Manager or Site Administrator role - only such users can carry out this action.
Publish item, making it available externally on the Internet for any user, including anonymous visitors.
Restrict visibility of project to its members only.

Log a change or information about a content item at the point in time of a call.  This action is not intended to be called by user-facing menu choice, but programmatically as a side-effect of some set of user actions.  Remain in current state.
